creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Skirt, brick red silk in two sections, each divided into panels the lower parts of which are woven in gold, yellow, green, blue and white with dragons, clouds, birds etc., panels outlined with narrow bands of black satin. Lining of white damask, broad cotton waistband. Three large stains.
title: Woman's skirt
